StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_TERRAN_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Earth government, the forerunner of the Terran Alliance. Considered naive by the rest of the galaxy, they will soon prove to be a force to be respected, with their innovative spirit and willingness to do what must be done to survive.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_TERRAN_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: The last great leader of the United Earth, and the father of the Terran Alliance.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_TERRAN_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: January 2178: 10 years have passed since the Arcean Empire sent humanity the instructions to build a Stargate, inviting them to join the larger galactic community. But humanity returned their gift in a surprising way. They reverse-engineered the Stargate technology and then took it further. Combining it with their own great breakthrough, Cascading Fusion, they were able to create a new drive system that would allow a starship to travel faster than light anywhere in the galaxy, without a Stargate. Shortly after these well-meaning engineers shared this new "Hyperdrive" with the Arceans, all contact with them was lost.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_TERRAN_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Humanity has decided to explore the galaxy on its own. They have finished the first two of their colossal new Colony ships, and are ready to take their first steps out of their home system.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_GUILD_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: Spawned_FACTION_GUILD_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Steller Guild started as a splinter group of humanity, Unhappy with Earths role over early colonies. They have since become a magnet those that wish to overthought or destroy the United Earth government.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_DRENGIN_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin are a profoundly evil and warlike civilization. Exceedingly clever and vicious, there are few beings capable of meeting a Drengin and not becoming its next meal.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_DRENGIN_StartupDescription
StringTable.String:
The Drengin are one of the older races in the galaxy, with an internal history rich with conquest and bloodshed, dominating the lesser species of their planet.
Cruel, but inventive, many of their victims have discovered that the Drengin are not mindlessly stupid, and can even be quite creative when it comes to the application of evil. There are few ways to devour a slaveling that the Drengin haven't thought up, though most acknowledge that simple beatings are usually the more economically prudent option.

StringTable.Label: Haven_FACTION_DRENGIN_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Drengin soldiers are savagely effective at ground-based combat, and their naval vessels are famously tough. Their military manufacturing ability is also impressive, but Drengin colonies do sometimes struggle with discontent. Much of their famous inventiveness is put into stopping slaveling revolts.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DLC_SPACEMONSTER_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: Spawned_SPACEMONSTER_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: Xendar_FACTION_TERRAN_Dec
StringTable.String: Terrans are the inventors of hyperdrive and the youngest race on the galactic stage. Although committed diplomats, Terrans have a militaristic streak that has taken many by surprise.

StringTable.Label: Xendar_FACTION_TERRAN_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: The last great leader of the United Earth, and the father of the Terran Alliance.

StringTable.Label: Xendar_FACTION_TERRAN_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: September 2214: Decades have passed since humanity founded its first colonies. Now these worlds have grown to be rivals of Earth itself. Together they have formed a new government, and an alliance that binds all humanity together: the Terran Alliance. During this time they have encountered new races, including the mysterious, and all too human Altarian Republic, and the hostile Dominion of the Korx, but Earth and its core colonies have remained unthreatened, until now. All contact with Haven was lost. A lone scout has returned to human space, with news of the greatest loss of human life in history. Haven has been captured by an unknown race called the Xendar, and all the colonists killed.

StringTable.Label: Xendar_FACTION_TERRAN_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Earth and its remaining colonies have vowed revenge and begun the construction of a powerful interstellar fleet. Their goal; to take back Haven, and eliminate the Xendar menace.

StringTable.Label: Xendar_Xendar_Faction_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Xendar are a mysterious race, that we have not been able to communicate with. They attacked the planet haven without warning, They seem to be a valiant warrior race from the little that we have been able to observe.
